summary: A small mod that is a Female Combat Barbarian.
descriptionHtml:
A Female Imperial Combat Barbarian, that wears light armor, proficient in all weapons, but no magika. Comes equipped with Jarl Elisef\'s clothes and dagger, and a frost weapon. 

This mod is best with both the Conrad and Faren mods together, as they are modeled after a married couple, the developers. 

Speed increase 25% so they don\'t get left behind.

She is essential and capable of being married. She levels with you, too. 

She can use one low level healing spell to heal himself. 

Located in Riverwood, and may be found throughout the town.

This is working BETA and direct support is not available for this mod. 


Check out my other mods:
Snowflake Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24849
Kenzie Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24821
Spot Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24796
Conrad Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24755
author: Faren Russell
